shortDescription: We've just lost contact with one of our facilities, Commander, and we need your help. Earlier today, our facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} received what they believed was a normal data transmission. It was badly garbled, and when they requested it be re-sent, they got no response. Shortly thereafter the base systems began to malfunction, and then we lost contact with both the base and the synchronous satellites covering that region. We'd like you to investigate the facility.
longDescription: I don't like the sound of this, Commander. No satellite coverage means no topographical intel. We're going into an unknown situation without a map.

contractObjectiveList.title: Investigate Facility and Extract Safely
contractObjectiveList.description: Destroy Enemy Structures and Extract Safely

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Facility
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the targeted buildings.

objectiveList.title: Destroy Facility Defenders
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the garrison / defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The objective to eliminate enemy reinforcements who attack.

objectiveList.title: Get to the evac zone
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to extract their units.

dialogueContent.words: Boss, there's a garbage signal blasting out of that base's transmitters. Want me to put it through?
NO! Do not let it through! Commander, I suspect the signal contains some kind of virus that caused the facility to go offline.
That could also explain the satellite failures. Okay, people, don't answer any calls from outside our secure comms.
Commander, Darius: if I'm right, that base will need to be completely destroyed.
Acknowledged, Dr. Murad. Commander, once you've dealt with the base, Meyer will be on station to pick you up at this LZ.
I wonder if {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} intended this to happen, or if they were themselves infected?
As long as we've wiped out all traces of that signal, I'm not sure I care.
I'd be quite surprised if we never saw that signal again, Darius. It's like bedbugs: the sort of thing that you never quite eradicate.
We need to pull out and alert our employers about this situation. Containing this signal is their problem, now.
Picking up some 'Mech signatures. Looks like {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} livery.
Commander, with comms switched off, I have no idea if the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces are part of an attack, or additional victims of the signal.
Listen, XO, all due respect, but they're shooting at our damn 'Mechs. Who cares why? Waste 'em.
As odd as this sounds... I agree with Mr. Virtanen. Anything that was exposed to that signal needs to be completely destroyed.
We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
